name: Farm On Wheels
description:
Welcome to our game "Farm on Wheels"! (use full-screen it for the best immersion!)

A monstrous catastrophe has engulfed the earth, and now people are forced to survive in different ways. You are an experienced farmer who was able to equip his minivan for seed cultivation. Going along an endless abandoned road, you will buy seeds from muddy merchants and sell vegetables to other wanderers, in the hope that this road will lead you to a place where you can settle down in peace.

Management:
"Space" - Open/Close The Farm
"Esc" - Open The Exit Window
"Drag&Drop" - Plant Bags Of Seeds In The Beds
"Left Click" - Harvest

In the future, we hope to add more content and mechanics (buying trailers to expand the farm, fuel and water supplies, more objects to interact with along the way)
